mapper.select: select * from feed where is_hide = false and is_delete = false ORDER BY feed_id DESC LIMIT 10;
select * from feed where is_hide = false and is_delete = false and feed_id <= #{id} ORDER BY feed_id DESC LIMIT 10;
select * from feed where feed_id = #{id} and is_hide = false and is_delete = false;
mapper.insert: insert into feed (user_id,title,content,is_hide,is_delete,created_at,modified_at) values (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{is_hide}, false, now(), now())
mapper.update: update feed set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modified_at = now() where feed_id = #{feed_id}
update feed set is_delete = true where feed_id = #{id}
